name: Squid Commando
description:
Travel back in time and rediscover the classic arcade shoot-'em-up with a great comic-style look!

Squid Commando is an arcade shoot-'em-up game in which you have to fight alone or in pairs in co-op mode, against the whole army of General Darken. You can choose from three characters with different weapons as you shoot down swarms of enemies through five different levels.

Non-Stop Action!
Whether a rafting trip in a river, driving with tanks, arming turrets.... Here you can shoot and destroy almost anything! Collect many different power-ups and upgrade your weapons!
Save as many prisoners as possible and travel from one mission to another! But Attention: Watch out for dangerous alligators when you are in the water.

Compete with the best mercenaries in the world and defend your position in the online rankings.

Are you ready for an action-packed mission? Let's go!

Key Features:

  • 5 action packed Levels
  • 3 Characters with different Weapons and characteristics
  • Tanks & Turrets
  • Classic Arcade Gameplay
  • Couch Co-Op
  • Online Leaderboards
  • Camera views near or far
  • Pickup Items
  • weapon upgrades & flamethrower
  • Airstrike Request
  • Final Bosses
  • compatible with Steam Deck
  • Keyboard and mouse support
  • Gamepad support
